dcterms:description: A self-collected dataset consisting of 8 scenes in everyday environments with various types of moving or deforming specular objects. Each scene contains two videos captured by two forward-facing cameras, with one camera used for training and the other for testing.
dcterms:title: Dynamic Specular Dataset

dcterms:creator: Keunhong Park
Utkarsh Sinha
Peter Hedman
Jonathan T. Barron
Sofien Bouaziz
Dan B Goldman
Ricardo Martin-Brualla
Steven M. Seitz
dcterms:description: A dataset used for training and testing dynamic scenes with a higher-dimensional representation for topologically varying neural radiance fields.
dcterms:title: HyperNeRF Dataset

dcterms:creator: Keunhong Park
Utkarsh Sinha
Jonathan T. Barron
Sofien Bouaziz
Dan B Goldman
Steven M. Seitz
Ricardo Martin-Brualla
dcterms:description: A dataset for deformable neural radiance fields, allowing for the reconstruction of dynamic scenes from monocular videos.
dcterms:title: Nerfies Dataset

dcterms:creator: Dor Verbin
Peter Hedman
Ben Mildenhall
Todd Zickler
Jonathan T. Barron
Pratul P. Srinivasan
dcterms:description: A dataset that provides structured view-dependent appearance for neural radiance fields, focusing on improving the rendering of specular surfaces.
dcterms:title: Ref-NeRF Dataset

dcterms:creator: Zhengqi Li
Simon Niklaus
Noah Snavely
Oliver Wang
dcterms:description: Datasets that include dynamic scenes for space-time view synthesis, focusing on neural scene flow fields.
dcterms:title: Existing Dynamic NeRF Datasets

dcterms:creator: Stephen Lombardi
Tomas Simon
Jason Saragih
Gabriel Schwartz
Andreas Lehrmann
Yaser Sheikh
dcterms:description: A dataset for learning dynamic renderable volumes from images, focusing on non-rigid object reconstruction.
dcterms:title: Neural Volumes Dataset
